abstract: Maureen Dowd Op-Ed column asserts that she has found the best way to alleviate the stress of work is yoga; highlights some of the more interesting findings in the William Broad book The Science of Yoga, which dispels myths about the practice and emphasizes some of its health benefits.
snippet: Killer yoga? William Broad’s new book nerve-rackingly reports: “Yoga can kill and maim, or save your life and make you feel like a god.”
lead_paragraph: Killer yoga? William Broad’s new book nerve-rackingly reports: “Yoga can kill and maim, or save your life and make you feel like a god.”

headline.main: How Garbo Learned to Stand on Her Head
headline.seo: How Garbo Learned to Stand on Her Head
headline.print_headline: How Garbo Learned to Stand on Her Head
